summary: Full-stack web application for Salad Khatora business with inventory management, product/recipe management (with availability toggle and recipe editing), billing/sales (product selection from menu), dashboard analytics (daily/weekly/monthly sales, cash flow, daily expenses), subscription management (weekly 6-day, monthly 24-day plans), alerts, admin auth, comprehensive reports download, customer management with push notifications, and CSV export
architectural_notes: Recipe-to-ingredient mapping for automatic inventory deduction on sales
Database structure optimized for small business scale
Alert/notification system with email placeholder integration
Customer data management with push notification capability
Comprehensive Excel report generation across all modules
Product availability toggle system for real-time menu control
Enhanced dashboard with cash flow and expense tracking
Print KOT functionality for subscription orders
known_issues: Logo image (logo.dim_256x256.png) not loading in navigation header
Edit and delete functionality not working for products in products tab
Edit and delete functionality not working for inventory items in inventory tab
Admin login page not appearing when opening site directly - authentication flow not enforcing login requirement

existing_features.title: Implement billing and sales system that generates invoices with customer name, phone number, items ordered, quantity, price, discount, payment mode, and date. Upon invoice generation, automatically deduct ingredient quantities from inventory based on the bowl's recipe mapping.

Build analytics dashboard displaying daily, weekly, and monthly sales totals, profit calculations (selling price minus cost price based on recipe ingredients), top-selling bowl products, and low-stock ingredient alerts.

Create subscription management module supporting weekly and monthly plans with 6 days/week option. Track customer details, plan type, start date, end date, bowl size, price, and payment status. Generate automatic alerts 2 days before subscription end date and mark subscriptions as expired when end date passes.

Implement alert system that displays low inventory warnings (when ingredient quantity falls below threshold) and subscription expiry notifications (2 days before end) on the dashboard. Include placeholder for future email notification integration.
Implement admin authentication system using Internet Identity for secure access to the application.
Design clean, mobile-friendly dashboard UI optimized for small food business owners in India. Include intuitive navigation between inventory, products, billing, subscriptions, and reports sections.
Implement CSV export functionality for sales records and inventory data, allowing business owner to download reports for offline analysis and record-keeping.
Update subscription plan durations: weekly plan must be 6 days and monthly plan must be 24 days in the subscription management system
Add 500gm bowl size option to product management in addition to existing 250gm and 350gm sizes
Expand dashboard analytics to track and display daily sales, weekly sales, monthly sales, cash flow, and daily expenses metrics
Create comprehensive reports tab with downloadable Excel-format reports covering inventory, sales, subscriptions, expenses, and all other business aspects for offline analysis
Create customer management tab to store customer data and enable sending push messages or notifications individually and in bulk
Enable product selection from available menu items in the billing tab invoice generation form
Add available/not available toggle option for each bowl in the menu/products tab
Add edit recipe option for each bowl in the menu/products tab allowing modification of ingredient quantities

Add a 'Print KOT' button in the subscription tab that generates a Kitchen Order Ticket (KOT) containing all currently active subscription plans with customer name, bowl size, and plan type for quick kitchen preparation
Use the generated logo image (logo.dim_256x256.png) as the application logo in the navigation header, replacing any existing placeholder logo
Add subscription name field to the subscription management module, allowing users to assign a custom name/label to each subscription (e.g., 'John's Weekly Plan', 'Office Subscription')

Implement edit functionality for subscriptions, allowing modification of subscription details including customer name, phone number, subscription name, plan type, bowl size, price, payment status, and dates
Implement delete functionality for subscriptions, allowing removal of subscription records with confirmation prompt to prevent accidental deletion
Fix logo image (logo.dim_256x256.png) not loading in the navigation header by verifying the image path is correct and the file exists in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Implement edit functionality for products in the products tab, allowing modification of product details including name, type, price, and availability status
Implement delete functionality for products in the products tab with confirmation dialog to prevent accidental deletion

Implement edit functionality for inventory items in the inventory tab, allowing modification of ingredient details including name, quantity, unit type, cost price, supplier name, and low stock threshold
Implement delete functionality for inventory items in the inventory tab with confirmation dialog to prevent accidental deletion
Restructure the inventory page to include four sub-tabs: Stock In, Stock Out, Write Off, and Stock Status. Replace the current single-view inventory management with a tabbed interface.

Implement Stock In tab with form to record incoming inventory, including fields for ingredient selection, quantity received, supplier name, purchase date, and cost price. Update ingredient quantities in the backend when stock is added.

Implement Stock Out tab with form to record inventory consumption or removal not tied to sales, including ingredient selection, quantity removed, reason for removal, and date. Decrease ingredient quantities in the backend when stock is removed.

Implement Write Off tab with form to record damaged, expired, or unusable inventory, including ingredient selection, quantity to write off, reason, and date. Decrease ingredient quantities in the backend and maintain a separate write-off log for tracking losses.

Implement Stock Status tab displaying the current inventory overview with all ingredients, their current quantities, unit types, cost prices, low-stock status indicators, and total inventory value. This should be the main view for monitoring current stock levels.
Display transaction history tables in Stock In, Stock Out, and Write Off tabs showing recent transactions with details like date, ingredient name, quantity, reason, and supplier (where applicable).
Update the CustomerForm component to include input fields for email, address, and preferences in addition to existing name and phone fields
Update the CustomerList component to display email, address, and preferences columns in the customer table view
Implement individual customer messaging functionality in the CustomersPage that allows sending offers, updates, and messages to a single selected customer
Ensure bulk messaging functionality in the CustomersPage allows sending offers, updates, and messages to multiple selected customers simultaneously
Protect the CustomersPage route with Internet Identity authentication, redirecting unauthenticated users to the LoginPage
Update the Layout component sidebar navigation to show the Customers menu item only when the user is authenticated

Update the App.tsx router configuration to enforce authentication checks on all protected routes (dashboard, inventory, products, billing, subscriptions, reports, customers). Unauthenticated users must be redirected to the login page (/login) before accessing any protected page.
Update the Layout component to check authentication state and redirect unauthenticated users to the login page if they attempt to access protected routes through direct navigation or URL entry.
Document the admin Internet Identity credentials in the project documentation or provide them in a secure manner to the user for accessing the application.

Update the LoginPage component to match the uploaded design mockup with centered card layout, 'Welcome Back' heading, 'Sign in to your Salad Khatora account' subtitle, email and password input fields with icons, green 'Sign In' button, 'Don't have an account? Sign up' link, and 'Back to Home' link at the bottom
Continue using Internet Identity authentication for the actual login functionality while styling the interface to match the traditional email/password design shown in the mockup

new_feature_requests.summary: Inventory management with ingredient tracking, cost price, supplier, low-stock threshold, and total value calculation
Product management for salad bowls (250gm, 350gm, custom) with recipe-to-ingredient mapping
Billing and sales system with invoice generation and automatic inventory deduction based on recipe mapping
Dashboard with daily/weekly/monthly sales, profit analytics, top-selling bowls, and low-stock alerts
Subscription management module with weekly/monthly plans, expiry alerts (2 days before), and auto-expiration marking
Alert system for low inventory and subscription expiry with dashboard visibility and email notification placeholder
Simple admin authentication system
Mobile-friendly UI suitable for small food business in India
CSV export functionality for sales and inventory reports

Create ingredient inventory management system with fields for ingredient name, current quantity (numeric), unit type (grams/kg), cost price per unit, supplier name, and low-stock threshold. Implement automatic calculation of total inventory value based on quantity Ã— cost price.

Create product management system for salad bowls with three types: 250gm, 350gm, and custom bowls. Each bowl must have a recipe that maps to specific ingredient quantities, enabling automatic inventory deduction when sales are recorded.
Update subscription plans: weekly plan = 6 days, monthly plan = 24 days
Add bowl size option: 500gm (in addition to existing 250gm and 350gm)
Expand dashboard analytics to track daily sales, weekly sales, monthly sales, cash flow, and daily expenses
Create comprehensive reports tab with downloadable Excel-format reports for all aspects (inventory, sales, subscriptions, expenses, etc.)
Create customer management tab to store customer data and enable individual and bulk push notifications/messages
In billing tab, enable product selection from available menu items
In menu/products tab, add available/not available toggle for each bowl and add edit recipe option
Add print KOT (Kitchen Order Ticket) functionality in subscription tab for current active plans to enable quick preparation
Backend must provide a query method to retrieve all currently active subscription plans with customer details, bowl size, and plan type for KOT generation
Enable edit and delete functionality for subscription users in subscription management
Add subscription name field to subscription management module
Add sub-tabs to inventory tab: Stock In, Stock Out, Write Off, and Stock Status

Create backend data types and storage for Stock In, Stock Out, and Write Off transaction records, including fields for transaction ID, ingredient ID, quantity, transaction type, reason, date, and supplier (for Stock In only).
Implement customer tab with form to save customer details including name, mobile number, email, address, and preferences fields
Add functionality to send offers, updates, and messages to customers individually from the customer tab
Add functionality to send offers, updates, and messages to customers in bulk from the customer tab
Extend the backend Customer data type to include email (Text), address (Text), and preferences (Text) fields in addition to existing name and phone fields
Add admin login/authentication requirement to access the customer management tab
Create a traditional username/password login interface instead of Internet Identity for admin authentication
